On Mon, Jan 21, 2008 at 05:32:12PM -0800, Colin Meyer wrote:
> 
> I tried disabling the DeDuplicator plugin, and had the same
> result.

I ran the same job, this time leaving the DeDupe stuff in, but switching
out the ARFrontier for the BdbFrontier. It is running just fine.

So the trouble seems to be with the ARFrontier. Is anyone running
ARFrontier with 1.12.1?

My goal with Heririx is to do continuous (incremental) crawling. Does
anyone use a strategy that does not include ARFrontier for incremental
crawling? Perhaps recrawling the same seeds on new jobs, but using the
DeDupe plugin to avoid re-downloading documents that I already have.

Thanks,
-Colin.
